sentences.en: Great Olympic athletes have become legendary.
sentences.cn: 杰出的奥林匹克运动员都已名扬四海.

sentences.en: He has his Provensal legendary lore at his fingers'ends.
sentences.cn: 他对普罗旺斯地区的口头传说了如指掌.

sentences.en: He is legendary for his fearlessness and pugnacity.
sentences.cn: 他是出了名的大胆好斗。

sentences.en: He remained always a mystery, living a life half - real, half - legendary.
sentences.cn: 他始终是个神秘人物, 过着一种半真实, 半虚幻的生活.

sentences.en: Her fey charm and eccentric ways were legendary.
sentences.cn: 她难以捉摸的魅力和怪异的行事方式都成了传奇。

sentences.en: His legendary tardiness left audiences waiting for hours.
sentences.cn: 他的迟到是出了名的，让观众干等了好几个小时。
他的政治手腕高超是出了名的。

sentences.en: His thoroughness and attention to detail is legendary.
sentences.cn: 他的严谨和对细节的关注是出了名的。

sentences.en: Legendary stories are passed down from parents to children.
sentences.cn: 传奇故事是由父母传给孩子们的.

sentences.en: Lonnie Johnson, the legendary blues guitarist
sentences.cn: 传奇蓝调吉他手朗尼·约翰逊

sentences.en: Odysseus was a legendary Greek hero.
sentences.cn: 奥狄修斯是传说中的希腊英雄.

sentences.en: Sarah finally meets this legendary man and promptly falls for him.
sentences.cn: 莎拉终于见到了这个传说中的男人,并且立刻为之倾倒.

sentences.en: The hill is supposed to be the resting place of the legendary King Lud.
sentences.cn: 这座山据称是传说中的卢德王的长眠之处。
名扬四海的奥森∙韦尔斯

sentences.en: Their voracity is legendary and even the most hardened warriors cannot repress a shiver if one speaks about them.
sentences.cn: 他们的贪食是传奇性的,甚至强壮的战士也会因为提起他们而无法抑制的颤抖.

words.tran_cn: 传奇；说明；图例；刻印文字

trans.tran_cn: 传说的，传奇的，极其著名的
